trans-unit.source: To insert or update an entity, you include with the request an an OData ATOM or OData JSON entity that specifies the properties and data for the entity.
trans-unit.target: To insert or update an entity, you include with the request an an OData ATOM or OData JSON entity that specifies the properties and data for the entity.

trans-unit.source: For more information regarding the format of the payload see <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information regarding the format of the payload see <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="9ca046aa-e9b4-4eaf-a7c0-d6ccdbaf48b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Entity</link> operation inserts a new entity with a unique primary key, formed from the combination of the PartitionKey and the RowKey.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="9ca046aa-e9b4-4eaf-a7c0-d6ccdbaf48b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Entity</link> operation inserts a new entity with a unique primary key, formed from the combination of the PartitionKey and the RowKey.

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="96a833e2-388c-460c-bfad-11e723c67d3f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Entity</link> operation replaces an existing entity with the same <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>PartitionKey</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> and <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>RowKey</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="96a833e2-388c-460c-bfad-11e723c67d3f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Entity</link> operation replaces an existing entity with the same <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>PartitionKey</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> and <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>RowKey</unmanagedCodeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="55fdf460-c80e-43af-bf1d-fbf5a4ad2291" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Merge Entity</link> operation updates the properties of an existing entity, but does not replace the entity.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="55fdf460-c80e-43af-bf1d-fbf5a4ad2291" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Merge Entity</link> operation updates the properties of an existing entity, but does not replace the entity.

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="2de2c193-befe-4b7f-864a-650f3d861939" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Or Merge Entity</link> operation creates a new entity with a unique primary key or updates the properties of an existing entity, but does not replace the entity.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="2de2c193-befe-4b7f-864a-650f3d861939" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Or Merge Entity</link> operation creates a new entity with a unique primary key or updates the properties of an existing entity, but does not replace the entity.

trans-unit.source: The <link xlink:href="630d4109-2112-46c2-83fc-657d2ab1d26f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Or Replace Entity</link> operation creates a new entity with a unique primary key or replaces an existing entity.
trans-unit.target: The <link xlink:href="630d4109-2112-46c2-83fc-657d2ab1d26f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Or Replace Entity</link> operation creates a new entity with a unique primary key or replaces an existing entity.

trans-unit.source: The Atom feed for an insert or update operation defines the entity's properties by specifying their names and data types, and sets the values for those properties.
trans-unit.target: The Atom feed for an insert or update operation defines the entity's properties by specifying their names and data types, and sets the values for those properties.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>content</languageKeyword> element contains the entity's property definitions, which are specified within the <languageKeyword>m:properties</languageKeyword> element.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>content</languageKeyword> element contains the entity's property definitions, which are specified within the <languageKeyword>m:properties</languageKeyword> element.

trans-unit.source: The property's type is specified by the <languageKeyword>m:type</languageKeyword> attribute.
trans-unit.target: The property's type is specified by the <languageKeyword>m:type</languageKeyword> attribute.

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about property types, see <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For detailed information about property types, see <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Here is an example of an Atom feed for an <link xlink:href="9ca046aa-e9b4-4eaf-a7c0-d6ccdbaf48b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Entity</link> operation:
trans-unit.target: Here is an example of an Atom feed for an <link xlink:href="9ca046aa-e9b4-4eaf-a7c0-d6ccdbaf48b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Insert Entity</link> operation:

trans-unit.source: To insert or update an entity using the OData JSON format, create a JSON object with property names as keys together with their property values.
trans-unit.target: To insert or update an entity using the OData JSON format, create a JSON object with property names as keys together with their property values.

trans-unit.source: You may need to include the property type if it cannot be inferred through OData JSON type detection heuristics.
trans-unit.target: You may need to include the property type if it cannot be inferred through OData JSON type detection heuristics.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link> for information on property type detection heuristics and on using JSON OData.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="9f1dce4a-d528-40ec-a5a4-fd93f9ee4c5e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Payload Format for Table Service Operations</link> for information on property type detection heuristics and on using JSON OData.

trans-unit.target: The JSON payload corresponding to the ATOM example above is as follows:
